// <auto-generated/>
using System;
using System.Buffers.Binary;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Runtime.CompilerServices;
using System.Text;
using FourSer.Contracts;
using System.IO;
using FourSer.Gen.Helpers;

namespace FourSer.Tests.GeneratorTestCases.SimpleConcreteCollection;

public partial class SimpleConcreteCollectionTest : ISerializable<SimpleConcreteCollectionTest>
{
    public static int GetPacketSize(SimpleConcreteCollectionTest obj)
    {
        var size = 0;
        size += sizeof(int); // Count size for Cats
        foreach(var item in obj.Cats)
        {
            size += Cat.GetPacketSize(item);
        }
        return size;
    }

    private SimpleConcreteCollectionTest(System.Collections.Generic.List<FourSer.Tests.GeneratorTestCases.SimpleConcreteCollection.Cat> cats)
    {
        this.Cats = cats;
    }

    public SimpleConcreteCollectionTest()
    {
        this.Cats = default;
    }

    public static SimpleConcreteCollectionTest Deserialize(System.ReadOnlySpan<byte> buffer, out int bytesRead)
    {
        var originalBuffer = buffer;
        var catsCount = FourSer.Gen.Helpers.RoSpanReaderHelpers.ReadInt32(ref buffer);
        var cats = new System.Collections.Generic.List<FourSer.Tests.GeneratorTestCases.SimpleConcreteCollection.Cat>(catsCount);
        for (int i = 0; i < catsCount; i++)
        {
            cats.Add(Cat.Deserialize(buffer, out var itemBytesRead));
            buffer = buffer.Slice(itemBytesRead);
        }
        var obj = new SimpleConcreteCollectionTest(cats);
        bytesRead = originalBuffer.Length - buffer.Length;
        return obj;
    }

    public static int Serialize(SimpleConcreteCollectionTest obj, System.Span<byte> data)
    {
        var originalData = data;
        FourSer.Gen.Helpers.SpanWriterHelpers.WriteInt32(ref data, (int)obj.Cats.Count);
        for (int i = 0; i < obj.Cats.Count; i++)
        {
            var bytesWritten = Cat.Serialize(obj.Cats[i], data);
            data = data.Slice(bytesWritten);
        }
        return originalData.Length - data.Length;
    }
}


// <auto-generated/>
using System;
using System.Buffers.Binary;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Runtime.CompilerServices;
using System.Text;
using FourSer.Contracts;
using System.IO;
using FourSer.Gen.Helpers;

namespace FourSer.Tests.GeneratorTestCases.SimpleConcreteCollection;

public partial class Cat : ISerializable<Cat>
{
    public static int GetPacketSize(Cat obj)
    {
        var size = 0;
        size += sizeof(int); // Size for unmanaged type Id
        size += StringEx.MeasureSize(obj.Name); // Size for string Name
        return size;
    }

    private Cat(int id, string name)
    {
        this.Id = id;
        this.Name = name;
    }

    public Cat()
    {
        this.Id = default;
        this.Name = default;
    }

    public static Cat Deserialize(System.ReadOnlySpan<byte> buffer, out int bytesRead)
    {
        var originalBuffer = buffer;
        var id = FourSer.Gen.Helpers.RoSpanReaderHelpers.ReadInt32(ref buffer);
        var name = FourSer.Gen.Helpers.RoSpanReaderHelpers.ReadString(ref buffer);
        var obj = new Cat(id, name);
        bytesRead = originalBuffer.Length - buffer.Length;
        return obj;
    }

    public static int Serialize(Cat obj, System.Span<byte> data)
    {
        var originalData = data;
        FourSer.Gen.Helpers.SpanWriterHelpers.WriteInt32(ref data, (Int32)obj.Id);
        FourSer.Gen.Helpers.SpanWriterHelpers.WriteString(ref data, obj.Name);
        return originalData.Length - data.Length;
    }
}
